data.message: Maybe if he didn’t get all political and makes half his fans chose him or the president his career wouldn’t need a revival

replies.message: Guess we can see which side you’re on.
Half his fans hahahaha
Eminem shitting on trump for being vulgar and irrational with his tweets, when ole Marshall’s career was built on the same thing🤔 yeah I’m on the side not being hypocritical
Lmao... Eminem could retire right now and still be a legend. He didn't lose nothing. He didn't tell one lie in his cypher.
Dayton you’re in high school stfu I was a fan when you were in your dads nuts
Ryan Safford one is a rapper and the other is the supposed leader of the free world. You’re welcome.
Hahaha poor little snowflake
One is a reformed junkie, one is the president. Yeah I’ll make the better judgement here
"Fuck money I don't rap for dead presidents I'd rather see the president dead It's never been said but I set precedents and the standards and they can't stand it"
One is a rap legend and one had his family pay a Dr to say he had bone spurs so he could Dodge the draft.
His last album which came out in 2013 has sold 8 million copies to date. His career doesn’t need the revival, buddy.
Stomp, push, shove, mush. Fuck Bush. Until they bring our troops home, come on.
Hardly a choice, the fact that you view it as one speaks volumes to your lack of character.

"Let the President answer a higher anarchy. Strap him with an AK-47, let him go fight his own war, let him impress daddy that way. No more blood for oil, we got our own battles to fight on our own soil"
It's not him that needs anything! He knew this day was coming!
You mean the war that I fought for under bush and obama? Yeah totally trumps war huh?

"(I am) the ringleader of this circus of worthless pawns sent to lead the march right up to the steps of Congress, and p**s on the lawns of the White House, to burn the ​​flag​​ and replace it with a Parental Advisory sticker, to spit liquor in the faces of this democracy of hypocrisy,"
Aww, sad little cuckcake crying about serving.
He’s always been political...... since Eminem show
even middle aged white moms who live in suburbia knw that rap has been steeped in cultural/political issues from the start.  its absolutely appropriate.
And of course the cuck with a feed full of literal RW propaganda would post Cheeto Hitler gifs
You can leave Daylon Bowmaker and you’re little communist views can go with you
